page.title: 04Childrens Strike
page.content: In May this year pupils of our school became involved in a strike. It was organised by a youth trade union movement to complain about being forced to go on a Youth Training Sceme. Because our school became one of the first to take part we were mentioned in the national press . It seemed funny seeing our school name in the papers. A few hundred children from Kirkby took part in the strike, though a lot of them did not really know why they went out. Some thought it was a complaint about school dinners! Unfortunately, some only went on strike because they were frightened by what there friends would say if they didn't.
